properties.name: dua.tia.repositoryharvester.keywords.config-file
properties.description: relative path of keywords json config file

properties.name: dua.tia.repositoryharvester.json-response-max-size
properties.description: Maximum stream text size for the Jackson ObjectMapper used to parse the query results

properties.description: Filename of the Journals Impact Factor csv file

properties.name: dua.tia.repositoryharvester.journals.skip-header
properties.description: Skip header in the Journals csv file

properties.name: dua.tia.repositoryharvester.journals.issns-column
properties.description: Column number for Journal issns list

properties.description: Url template for the configuration manager "repo-search-binding" service

properties.description: Url template for the configuration manager "keyword-dictionary" service

properties.name: dua.tia.configurationmanager.group-acronym.url
properties.description: Url template for the configuration manager "repository-search-bindings-acronym" service

properties.description: Url template for the configuration manager "query-max-publication-date" service
